ing: 2 pounds small red potatoes, unpeeled, cooked, cooled, and cut in bite-size pieces
1 cup sliced green onions, with green
2 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar, or other white vinegar
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
des: "Here's a salad with loads of disease-fighting antioxidants in the potatoes, tomatoes, onions, basil, garlic and olive oil. True, white potatoes tend to boost blood sugar, but the vinegar in this recipe helps to suppress such rises, making this a healthful salad."
ins:
In a large bowl, combine potatoes, tomatoes, onions, basil, and celery.
In a small bowl, whisk together garlic, vinegar, oil, mustard, salt and pepper.  Add dressing to potatoes and toss.  Refrigerate until ready to serve.
